name: Color Bot
description:
Color Bot is a 3D match-three game inspired by toys like Rubik's Cubes and games like Candy Crush and Tetris.

You control a quirky musical robot to spin and match three colors for points. You can customize your robot in the garage with new cosmetic items and gameplay changing equipment.

Watch the Trailer : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=64iWoukgyKM
